title: kaNNuLLapOdE
sahitya:
kaNNuLLapOdE nAn kANEnO en kAdalaik-koLLai koNDa kaLLA unai uLLArak-


anupallavi

  eNNum eNNangaLellAm paNNum paNigaLellAm iyambu mozhigaLellAm svuyambhuvan mayamAkkik-


caraNam    uDalinil uyiruLLa pOdE un uNarvinai maravAdE kaDattilE kATruLLapOdE andak-karaNangaL 
pisagAdE dhiDa bhakti koNDu nAn maDamai iruLai venrE iDamagjal ulagilum ennuLLum yAnAgak-
